PresentDirector, Institute for Data Innovation in Science, Data Discovery Center, 2024.03 - PresentAdjunct Professor, Interdisciplinary Program in Artificial Intelligence at Seoul National University, 2022.04- PresentAssstant Professor, Department of Statistics at  Seoul National University, 2022.03 - 2024.02Assistant Professor, University of Seoul, 2018.03 - 2022.02Post-doc Fellow, University of Michigan - Ann Arbor, 2016.09 - 2018.02 (Advisors: Liza Levina and Ji Zhu)EducationPh.D in Statistics, University of Wisconsin - Madison, 2011.09 - 2016.08 (Advisor: Garvesh Raskutti)B.S in Statistics, Seoul National University, 2003.03 - 2011.02Research Interests Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence: Research on applying statistical methods to machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence, including interpretation and reliability analysis of AI models.Big Data Analysis and Predictive Modeling: Research on statistical analysis and predictive modeling using large-scale data from various fields, including preprocessing, model selection, and evaluation of big data.Experimental Design and Statistical Experimental Analysis: Research on statistical experimental design and analysis, including effective experimental planning, analysis, and interpretation of experimental data.Applied Statistics: Research on applying statistics to various fields such as healthcare, finance, and public policy, focusing on statistical approaches and analysis.Contractgw.park23 (at) gmail (dot) com / gwpark23 (at) snu (dot) ac (dot) kr / gwpark23 (at) ucsb (dot) eduPost.Doc남승찬 (Post.Doc., 2025-Present)박수진 (Post.Doc., 2025-Present) Ph.D. Donguk Shin/신동욱 (Ph.D., 2024 - Present)Dong Uk is interested in topics related to Directed acyclic graphical (DAG) models, especially in structure learning algorithms. He received his M.S. degree from Seoul National University in 2024 and his B.A. degree in Applied Statistics from Chung-Ang University in 2021. Research Topic: Forward Learning of Linear SEMsOptimal Estimation of Linear SEMsNon-Gaussian Anchored Model LearningMeasurement Error Variance EstimationConstraint Cholesky DecompositionContract: dushin 9980 at gmail dot com Sunmin Oh/오선민 (Ph.D., 2024 - Present)Sunmin is interested in machine learning and deep neural network, including both theoretical elements and algorithms. She completed B.S. in Statistics and Financial Mathematics at Seoul National University in 2022. She received her M.S. degree from Seoul National University in 2024 Research Topic: Bayesian Approach for Bayesian Network Estimation Optimal Estimation of Linear SEMs Optimal Learning of LINGAMsSparse Cholesky DecompositionContract: sunmin 01111 at gmail dot com Byeongguk Kang/강병국 (M.S.-Ph.D., 2023 - Present)Byeong Guk is interested in probabilistic graphical models and statistical machine learning, including both theories and algorithms. He received B.A. degree in Law from Korean National Police University in 2021.Research Topic: Incomplete Data AnalysisHigh-dimensional DAG Learning from Contaminated DataContract: kk 9983612 at gmail dot comM.S.
